title: Object Group
description: An intentionally grouped set of objects with one or more common characteristics.

properties.name: alternativeCollectionName
properties.description: A short title different to the one given in ObjectGroup.collectionName that is used to summarise the collection objects contained within the ObjectGroup.

items.description: A short title different to the one given in ObjectGroup.collectionName that is used to summarise the collection objects contained within the ObjectGroup.

properties.name: baseTypeOfCollection
properties.description: High-level term describing the fundamental nature of objects in the ObjectGroup.

properties.name: collectionManagementSystem
properties.description: The collection management system which is used to hold and manage the primary data for the objects contained within the ObjectGroup.

items.description: The collection management system which is used to hold and manage the primary data for the objects contained within the ObjectGroup.

properties.name: collectionName
properties.description: A short title that summarises the collection objects contained within the ObjectGroup.

properties.name: conditionsOfAccess
properties.description: Information about who can access the collection being described or an indication of its security status.

items.description: Information about who can access the collection being described or an indication of its security status.

properties.name: degreeOfEstablishment
properties.description: The degree to which an Organism survives, reproduces, and expands its range at the given place and time.

items.description: The degree to which an Organism survives, reproduces, and expands its range at the given place and time.

properties.name: description
properties.description: A free text description or narrative about the collection.

properties.name: discipline
properties.description: A high level classification of the scientific discipline to which the objects within the collection belong or are related.

items.description: A high level classification of the scientific discipline to which the objects within the collection belong or are related.

properties.name: hasChronometricAge
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the ChronometricAge class.

properties.name: hasCollectionStatusHistory
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the CollectionStatusHistory class.

properties.name: hasEvent
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Event class.

properties.name: hasGeographicOrigin
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the GeographicOrigin class.

properties.name: hasGeologicalContext
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the GeologicalContext class.

properties.name: hasIdentifier
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Identifier class.

properties.name: hasMeasurementOrFact
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the MeasurementOrFact class.

properties.name: hasObjectClassification
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the ObjectClassification class.

properties.name: hasOrganisationalUnit
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the OrganisationalUnit class.

properties.name: hasPersonRole
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the PersonRole class.

properties.name: hasReference
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Reference class.

properties.name: hasResourceRelationship
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the ResourceRelationship class.

properties.name: hasStorageLocation
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the StorageLocation class.

properties.name: hasTaxon
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Taxon class.

properties.name: isCurrentCollection
properties.description: A flag to indicate whether the collection still exists as a single entity.

properties.name: isKnownToContainTypes
properties.description: Flag property to indicate that the collection is known to include type specimens.

properties.name: material
properties.description: Material denotes the raw substance(s) from which the object is formed, in whole or in part.

items.description: Material denotes the raw substance(s) from which the object is formed, in whole or in part.

properties.name: objectType
properties.description: High-level terms for the classification of curated objects.

items.description: High-level terms for the classification of curated objects.

properties.name: period
properties.description: Used to describe prehistoric or historic periods.

items.description: Used to describe prehistoric or historic periods.

properties.name: preparationType
properties.description: A term used to classify or describe an object that indicates the actions that have been taken upon it and/or the processes it has been put through to prepare it for scientific use or study.

items.description: A term used to classify or describe an object that indicates the actions that have been taken upon it and/or the processes it has been put through to prepare it for scientific use or study.

properties.name: preservationMethod
properties.description: A term used to classify or describe an object that indicates the primary or most recent action, measure or process that has been used in order to preserve the objects in the collection for long-term storage.

items.description: A term used to classify or describe an object that indicates the primary or most recent action, measure or process that has been used in order to preserve the objects in the collection for long-term storage.

properties.name: preservationMode
properties.description: The means by which a palaeontological specimen was preserved or created e.g. body, cast, mold, trace fossil, soft parts mineralised etc.

items.description: The means by which a palaeontological specimen was preserved or created e.g. body, cast, mold, trace fossil, soft parts mineralised etc.

properties.name: typeOfCollection
properties.description: Additional information that exists that describes the object(s) in the collection.

items.description: Additional information that exists that describes the object(s) in the collection.
